    • Method Detail

      • setPowerState

        public void setPowerState(PowerModel.PowerState state,
                 int deviceId)
        Set a light's power state. No response.
        Parameters:
        dstAddr - Destination address.
        state - Light state.

      • requestState

        public void requestState(byte index,
                int deviceId)
        Get the power state. Response is MESSAGE_POWER_STATE with data:
        • EXTRA_INDEX (byte)
        • EXTRA_POWER_STATE (byte)
        Parameters:
        index - Model index (to distinguish multiple instances of a model running on the same device).
        deviceId - The device address of the light.
